main.name: Raphael Casarotto
main.description: I have 6 years of experience in front-end, back-end and game development. Along these years i've been working as a employee (full-stack) and freelancing (game development)
main.bio: I'm a commited programmer with good interpersonal relashionships. I love learning new languages and I can say that I'm a fast learner.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

address.street: Rua vinte e cinco de dezembro, 300

resume.skillmessage: All the techs I've been learned so far:

education.description: In my research for more knowlege, I started to study computer science.
I aways been passionate about game developing. So i decided to drop off computer science to follow my heart.

work.title: Leader Programmer
work.description: Since 2014 I started freelancing as a game developer to P8G studio. I've been leading some programming teams and coding the core of some games.

work.title: Full Programmer
work.description: Worked on many bots using Java/Curl/Maven/Docker and some other projects where I developed a restfull api using Node, PostgreSQL and React (with Hooks). I've been working on Python scripts too.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.
